Body:
Description: Hello,

I hope this message finds you well.

I am experiencing troubles sending email alerts from endpoint protector. I am using Google Mail as my email host. I've applied the recommended email settings, including creating SMTP relay, but I am not receiving any test emails from Endpoint Protector.


Kind Regards,

Olivier Adamczyk

What We've Learned Updated: the customer had issues setting up SMTP using Gmail
sent steps on configuring it and they managed to get it working.
Next Steps Updated: closing the case
